item.title: Command help
item.dc:creator: @runegay runegay
item.description:
@runegay wrote:

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("noclip") && playerRights >= 2)
{
if (absY <= 3000)
{	
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + "Is doing ::noclip");
}
else
{

sendMessage("You are using noclip..");
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " is doing ::noclip");

disconnected = true;
}
}
